title: Magic Lantern Set Effects Slide [Farmer and Pig]
brief_description: Hand painted magic lantern slipping slide in wooden frame. [Farmer and Pig] shows a farmer with a cane and a pig, when the slipping slide is moved, the farmer hits the pig with the cane and it jumps upwards.
